about.heading: Hi, I'm Shobhit
content: I am passionate about using UX/UI and IxD to design user-friendly products, environments and systems. I use my skills in user research, front end development, user testing, prototyping and heuristic evaluation to implement our clientâ€™s vision. I love solving problems and tackling new challenges. I look to create synergies and cohesion in teams to bring out the best performance and exceed expectations.
I am skilled with Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD and InVision.
